diff_hunk:
@@ -66,8 +66,8 @@ def step(self, closure=None):
                 state['step'] += 1
 
                 grad = grad.coalesce()  # the update is non-linear so indices must be unique
-                grad_indices = grad._indices()
-                grad_values = grad._values()
+                grad_indices = torch._indices(grad)
body:
cc @weiyangfb and @li-roy  for sparse things.

I feel uncomfortable breaking user code in one release; we should deprecate with warning and then break their code in a future release. On the other hand, idk how many people actually use sparse and we do promise no guarantees on our sparse API so...
